jcr:content.jcr:title: List of railway museums in the United Kingdom

contentheadline.headline: List of railway museums in the United Kingdom

contentrichtext.text: '''List of railway museums in the United Kingdom''' is a list of [[railway museum]]s in the [[United Kingdom]]. == England == * [[Amberley Working Museum]], [[Arundel]], [[West Sussex]] * [[Astley Green Colliery Museum]], [[Tyldesley]], [[Lancashire]] * [[Bahamas Locomotive Society]] * [[Barrow Hill Engine Shed]] * [[Beamish museum]] * [[Bere Ferrers railway station]] * [[Bideford Railway Heritage Centre]], [[Devon]] * [[Bishop's Castle Railway Museum]] * [[Bluebell Railway]] * [[Bressingham Steam Museum]], [[Norfolk, England|Norfolk]] * [[Bristol Harbour Railway and Industrial Museum]] * [[Buckinghamshire Railway Centre]], [[Buckinghamshire]] * [[Cambrian Heritage Railways]], [[Oswestry]], [[Shropshire]] * [[Coleford Great Western Railway Museum]], [[Coleford, Gloucestershire]] * [[Darlington Railway Centre and Museum]] (Recently renamed: Head of Steam) * [[Devon Railway Centre]], [[Devon]] * [[Didcot Railway Centre]] * [[Doncaster Works|Doncaster Railway Works]], [[Doncaster]], [[South Yorkshire]] * [[East Anglian Railway Museum]] * [[Swindon Steam Railway Museum|Great Western Railway Museum (Swindon Steam Railway Museum)]] * [[Hollycombe Steam Collection]] * [[Hopetown Carriage Works]] * [[Kew Bridge Steam Museum]] * [[Kidderminster Railway Museum]] * [[London Transport Museum]] * [[Shildon Locomotion Museum|Locomotion]], [[Shildon]], [[County Durham]] * [[Mangapps Railway Museum]] * [[Market Drayton Railway Preservation Society]] * [[Monkwearmouth Station Museum]], [[Sunderland, Tyne and Wear|Sunderland]] * [[Mid-Suffolk Light Railway]], [[Suffolk]] * [[Middleton Railway]], [[City of Leeds|Leeds]], [[West Yorkshire]] * [[Midland Railway - Butterley]], [[Derbyshire]] * [[Moseley Railway Trust]] * [[Museum of Rail Travel]], [[Ingrow (West)]], [[Keighley]] * [[National Railway Museum]], [[York]], [[North Yorkshire]] * [[National Tramway Museum]], [[Crich]], [[Derbyshire]] * [[North Ings Farm Museum]] * [[North Woolwich Old Station Museum]] * [[North Yorkshire Moors Railway]] (Reg. No. 290) * [[Northamptonshire Ironstone Railway Trust]] * [[Pendon Museum]] * [[Ribble Steam Railway]] * [[The Railway Age]] * [[Rushden Station Railway Museum]] * [[Rutland Railway Museum]], [[Rutland]] * [[Shildon Locomotion Museum]] * [[Shillingstone Railway Project]], [[Dorset]] * [[Somerset & Dorset Railway Heritage Trust]] * [[Southall Railway Centre]] * [[Stratford on Avon and Broadway Railway]] * [[Swindon Steam Railway Museum|Steam - Museum of the Great Western Railway]], [[Swindon]] * [[Stephenson Railway Museum]], [[North Shields]] * [[The Railway Age]], [[Crewe]] * [[Tyseley Locomotive Works]] * [[Walthamstow Pump House Museum]] ==Scotland== *[[Alford Valley Railway]] *[[Bo'ness and Kinneil Railway]] *[[Caledonian Railway (Brechin)]] *[[Glenfinnan station|Glenfinnan Station Museum]] *[[Keith and Dufftown Railway]] *[[Leadhills and Wanlockhead Railway]] *[[Maud Railway Museum]] *[[Scottish Industrial Railway Centre]] *[[Scottish Railway Preservation Society]] *[[Strathspey Railway (preserved)|Strathspey Railway]] ==Wales== *[[Narrow Gauge Railway Museum]] – [[Gwynedd]] *[[Conwy Valley Railway Museum]], [[Betws-y-Coed]] *[[Griffithstown Railway Museum]] (closed 2011) *[[Penrhyn Castle Railway Museum]] ==Northern Ireland== *[[Ulster Folk and Transport Museum]] ==Isle of Man== *[[Port Erin railway museum]] ==Channel Islands== * [[Pallot Heritage Steam Museum]] ==See also== *[[List of British heritage and private railways]] *[[Heritage railways in Northern Ireland]] *[[List of heritage railways]] *[[Mountain railway]] *[[List of Conservation topics]] *[[Conservation in the United Kingdom]] *[[List of railway companies]] *[[British Rail]] [[Category:British railway-related lists|British railway museums]] [[Category:Heritage railways in the United Kingdom]] [[Category:Lists of museums in the United Kingdom|Railway]] [[Category:Railway museums in the United Kingdom| ]]
